Q_DESC:
A company wants to calculate the aggregate of a student to decide whether he is eligible for the post.A student might be a class 10th or 12th passed out.
If he is in class 10,input marks of 4 subjects.
if he is is class 12,input marks of 3 subjects.
Calculate his average ,if average is more than 80%,he is eligible.
Input:First line contains class
Second line contain marks
